item.title: 美国将停止制造新硬币，理由是节约和需求量低
item.description: 美国政府以需求急剧下降和节省开支为由，停止生产便士。【原文：The US government is ending production of the penny, citing drastically decreased demand and immediate savings.】

item.title: 尽管有了新的人工智能工具，Workday 的发展前景依然乏善可陈
item.description: Workday Inc.预计本季度的订阅收入与华尔街的预期一致，这让希望这家软件公司能从其产品的新人工智能功能中获得提振的投资者感到失望。【原文：Workday Inc. projected subscription revenue in the current quarter in line with Wall Street estimates, disappointing investors looking for the software company to get a boost from new artificial intelligence features for its products.】

item.title: YouTube 挖来迪士尼官员负责全球媒体和体育事务
item.description:
Justin Connolly 将负责管理与主要媒体公司的关系，扩大现场体育投资组合

。【原文：

Justin Connolly will manage ties to major media companies, growing live-sports portfolio

】

item.title: 巴里-里索兹谈如何不投资
item.description:
当你不确定的时候，请先做出判断，而且 不要将投资与政治混为一谈。在本期Trillions节目中，长期理财经理巴里-里索兹（Barry Ritholtz）将为您介绍应避免的事项。【原文：

Admit when your unsure and don’t mix investing with politics. In this episode of Trillions, longtime money manager Barry Ritholtz dishes on what to avoid. 

】

item.title: Intuit 在推出更多税务服务后实现强劲增长
item.description: 在美国报税季结束后，Intuit 公司公布了强劲的收入增长，这表明这家财务软件公司正在成功地为用户提供更昂贵的服务。【原文：Intuit Inc. posted strong revenue growth following the end of the US tax season, suggesting the financial software company is finding success offering users more expensive services.】

item.title: Anthropic 首席执行官让员工做好准备，迎接人工智能改变他们的工作方式
item.description: 由于人工智能的出现，一家领先的人工智能研究实验室正在重新思考其员工的工作方式。但首先...【原文：One of the leading artificial intelligence research labs is rethinking the way its employees work because of AI. But first...】

item.title: 特朗普的房利美和房地美计划：谁输谁赢
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布他正在考虑对美国抵押贷款巨头房利美和房地美进行公开募股，这使得它们的股价飙升，对冲基金和其他投资者今年的收益扩大到近 500 亿美元。【原文：President Donald Trump’s announcement that he’s weighing a public offering of US mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac sent their shares soaring, extending gains this year for hedge funds and other investors to almost $50 billion.】

item.title: 巴克莱称日本可能要求国有企业购买债券
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）全球研究主席表示，如果较长期限债务的抛售势头不减，日本可能会考虑要求政府所有的实体支持该国的债券市场。【原文：Japan may consider asking government-owned entities to support the nation’s bond market if the selloff in longer-dated debt doesn’t abate, according to Barclays Plc’s global chair of research.】

item.title: 神秘期权买家押注美股上涨约 30 亿美元
item.description: 一位机构投资者以数十亿美元押注看涨美股，成为期权市场的热门话题。【原文：An institutional investor’s multi-billion dollar bullish bet on US stocks has become the talk of the options market.】

item.title: 苹果计划在 2026 年推出人工智能眼镜，取消带摄像头的手表
item.description: 苹果公司的目标是在明年年底推出智能眼镜，作为向人工智能增强型小工具推进的一部分，但该公司已经搁置了通过内置摄像头分析周围环境的智能手表计划。【原文：Apple Inc. is aiming to release smart glasses at the end of next year as part of a push into AI-enhanced gadgets, but it has shelved plans for a smartwatch that can analyze its surroundings with a built-in camera.】

item.title: 纽约联储主席佩里看到货币市场压力的早期迹象
item.description: 美联储庞大的证券投资组合经理表示，央行缩减资产负债表规模的努力已开始对回购协议市场造成压力。【原文：The manager of the Federal Reserve’s massive portfolio of securities said the central bank’s effort to reduce the size of its balance sheet is beginning to place pressure on the market for repurchase agreements.】

item.title: 股价下跌 31% 后，潘兴广场买入亚马逊股份
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场资本管理公司（Pershing Square Capital Management）在亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：Bill Ackman’s Pershing Square Capital Management built a new stake in Amazon.com Inc., calling it a “fantastic franchise” and noting that the investor acquired shares at an “extremely attractive” price.】

item.title: 钢铁工人老板敦促特朗普阻止收购美国钢铁公司
item.description: 美国钢铁工人联合会（United Steelworkers）主席戴维-麦考尔（David McCall）敦促唐纳德-特朗普总统阻止新日本钢铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.【原文：United Steelworkers President David McCall urged President Donald Trump to block Nippon Steel Corp.’s bid to purchase United States Steel Corp., reiterating his opposition to the controversial proposed merger.】

item.title: 房利美和房地美股价飙升，特朗普再次提出私有化计划
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提出将房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）在政府控制下近二十年后私有化的建议，使得这两家抵押贷款公司的股价跃升至 16 年来最高水平。【原文：A proposal by President Donald Trump to privatize Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac after almost two decades under government control has the mortgage companies’ stock prices leaping to their highest levels in 16 years.】

item.description:

item.title: Hinge Health 在以最高价 4.37 亿美元首次公开募股后大涨 19
item.description: Hinge Health 公司的股价上涨了 19%，此前这家数字物理治疗提供商和一群投资者在首次公开募股中筹集了 4.37 亿美元，定价为市场定价区间的最高价。【原文：Hinge Health Inc. shares rose 19% after the digital physical therapy provider and a group of investors raised $437 million in an initial public offering priced at the top of a marketed range.】

item.title: Tinder 首席执行官在 Match 集团的最新调整中下台
item.description: Tinder 首席执行官菲-伊奥索塔鲁诺（Faye Iosotaluno）在任职不到两年后将于 7 月卸任，这也是母公司 Match Group Inc.【原文：Tinder Chief Executive Officer Faye Iosotaluno will step down in July after less than two years in the role, adding to a string of executive changes at parent company Match Group Inc., which has struggled to return Tinder, its largest dating app brand, to growth.】

item.title: 斯蒂芬-米兰解释为何不存在秘密美元协定
item.description:
在今天的 "Big Take DC "播客中，白宫经济顾问委员会主席将谈论市场波动和货币政策。【原文：

On today’s Big Take DC podcast, the Chairman of the White House Council of Economic Advisers talks market volatility and currency policy.

】

item.title: 白宫发言人米兰称贸易谈判中没有秘密货币协定
item.description: 白宫首席经济学家驳斥了正在酝酿一项削弱美元的秘密货币协议的说法，转而吹捧强势美元的好处。【原文：The White House’s chief economist rejected the notion that a secret currency accord to weaken the dollar is in the works, and instead touted the benefits of a strong greenback.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）因退出和制裁而震荡，加密货币改革拭目以待
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会（US Commodity Futures Trading Commission）高调宣布离职的消息，正值美国衍生品监管机构动荡不安之际。【原文：The high-profile departure news at the US Commodity Futures Trading Commission couldn’t have come at a more turbulent time at the US derivatives regulator.】

item.title: 墨西哥谢因鲍姆称她在与特朗普的最新通话中谈到了钢铁关税问题
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆说，她在周四与唐纳德-特朗普的最新通话中讨论了美国的钢铝关税问题。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said she discussed US steel and aluminum tariffs on Thursday, in her latest call with Donald Trump.】

item.title: 部长称中国要求荷兰放宽芯片出口管制
item.description: 荷兰外交大臣卡斯帕-维尔德坎普（Caspar Veldkamp）在北京与中国官员会晤后表示，中国已要求荷兰放宽与半导体有关的出口限制。【原文：China has asked the Netherlands to relax export restrictions related to semiconductors, Dutch Foreign Affairs Minister Caspar Veldkamp said following a meeting with Chinese officials in Beijing.】

item.title: 斯塔默与高级助手就 25 亿英镑儿童福利金上限发生冲突
item.description: 据多位熟知内情的人士透露，基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）在是否取消二孩福利上限的问题上与他的得力幕僚长意见不一。【原文：Keir Starmer is at odds with his powerful chief of staff over whether to scrap a two-child cap on benefits, according to multiple people familiar with the matter, a costly policy move that the British prime minister is under pressure to make after bruising local election results.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司 Anthropic 推迟发布更强大的 Opus 模型
item.description: Anthropic 公司将推出两个新版本的 Claude 人工智能软件，包括对其高端 Opus 型号进行拖延已久的更新，因为这家初创公司正努力在竞争激烈的市场中保持领先地位。【原文：Anthropic is set to roll out two new versions of its Claude artificial intelligence software, including a long-delayed update to its high-end Opus model, as the startup vies to stay ahead of a crowded market.】

item.title: 西班牙推进对非欧盟购房者征收 100% 税收的计划
item.description: 西班牙政府正在推进一项有争议的提案，即向非欧盟居民征收 100% 的购房税，以解决正在酝酿的住房危机。【原文：Spain’s government is pushing ahead with a controversial proposal to hit non-European Union residents with a 100% tax when buying homes, as it seeks to tackle a brewing housing crisis.】

item.title: 瑞安-雷诺兹的 MNTN 在 1.87 亿美元首次公开募股后股价上涨 60
item.description: 互联电视广告平台 MNTN 公司及其部分股东在首次公开募股中筹集了 1.87 亿美元，此后该公司股价攀升了 60% 以上。【原文：Connected TV advertising platform MNTN Inc.’s shares climbed more than 60% after the company and some of its shareholders raised $187 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: Milei 的改革让阿根廷人无忧无虑地寄出 43,700 美元
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统提议全面改革阿根廷的税收制度，以减少繁文缛节，鼓励使用以前未申报的绿卡。【原文：President Javier Milei proposed an overhaul of Argentina’s tax system in order to cut red tape and encourage use of greenbacks that were previously undeclared.】

item.title: 塔吉特的麻烦让分析师的负面情绪成为 2018 年以来最严重的一次
item.description: 华尔街对 Target 公司的热情降至六年多来的最低点，因为这家大卖场零售商令人失望的收益刺激了一系列分析师下调其评级。【原文：Wall Street’s enthusiasm for Target Corp. is at its lowest in more than six years, as disappointing earnings from the big-box retailer spur a series of analyst downgrades.】

item.title: 债券投资者威胁对冲基金对掉期利差的热门押注
item.description: 长期债券收益率的飙升再次威胁到对冲基金对国债将比利率掉期表现更好的押注。【原文：A surge in long-term bond yields is once again threatening to upend a crowded hedge-fund bet that Treasuries will perform better than interest-rate swaps.】

item.title: 特朗普的下一个障碍：债券市场讨厌他的 "漂亮 "税收法案
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统在税收问题上与蓝州共和党人达成了协议，并在第 11 个小时内平息了保守派在支出问题上的叛乱，从而使他的 "一个大而漂亮的法案 "在众议院获得通过。【原文：President Donald Trump cut a deal with blue-state Republicans on taxes and put down an 11th-hour rebellion by conservatives over spending to get his “one big, beautiful bill” passed by the House.】
